name: SLINK-E (2D Platformer)
description:
SLINK-E is a 2D platformer built in Unity which has you play as cog named Slink. With your two very springy arms you will have to climb your way to safety in the bowels of an abandoned factory.

Just before you play:

  • A controller is needed to play this game, Xbox controllers work best <3.
  • The game runs best at 1920x1080
  • *Optional* If you use a DS3/ DS4 controller download "DS4Windows" to get vibration controls.
  • This game is still in development, so please any feedback would be great!
  • If you really want to help us out, follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/BananaBreadInt
